Title: Girard-Perregaux WW.TC Womens Automatic Watch 49860D11A761-BK7A
Description: Watches Jewelry Accessories About us Policies Girard-Perregaux WW.TC Womens Automatic Watch 49860D11A761-BK7A (Click to Enlarge) Girard-Perregaux WW.TC Womens Automatic Watch 49860D11A761-BK7A Condition: Certified Pre-Owned Brand: Certified Pre-Owned Retail Price: $20,600.00 Reference: 49860D11A761-BK7A Also Known As: 49860D11A761BK7A Web ID: 166926Stock Number: 2188885Case Size: 41 mm Gender: Ladies Movement: Automatic Caliber: GP 033G0 Bezel: Stainless Steel and Diamonds Functions: Hours, Minutes, Seconds, Power Reserve Display, World Time, Day & Night indicator Strap: Alligator Clasp Type: Deployment Signatures: Girard Perregaux Included Items: Manufacturer's Box and Papers Power Reserve: 46 Hours Materials: Stainless Steel Finishing: Stainless Steel Case Back: Transparent (See-Through) Dial Color: Mother of Pearl An exceptional display of horological genius, the ww.tc Lady watch from Girard Perregaux is a fine timepiece aficionados dream come true! The watch's round stainless steel case and white alligator leather strap are classy, yet casual enough for everyday wear. The white mother of pearl dial boasts Hours, Minutes, Seconds, Power Reserve Display, World Time, Day & Night indicator complications. Lastly, the watch's case back is transparent for an impressive view at the watch's inner mechanics and the strap fastens to the wrist with a deployment clasp. This elegant timepiece resists water to a depth of 50 meters and has a polished stainless steel diamond-paved bezel.Please note that some watches are on memo from other dealers and do not carry a return policy, you will be notified before your purchase if the selected watch meets this criteria.
